title: Bike Storage with Biometric Reader, Playground Area, Pet-Friendly
posting_body: ['Welcome to Sanctuary Doral', 'A 226 unit- 6 story rental community set in one of the most iconic communities in Doral which offers resort-style amenities, carefully thought out floor plans, and much more.', 'Sanctuary Doral is central to a vast array of quality restaurants, trendy shops, diverse entertainment venues, and arts culture.', 'Imagine a vibrant social scene layered with artfully designed units.', 'We offer 1, 2 & 3 bedroom units which feature state of the art finishes and cater to a variety of renters.', 'Sitting on 8 acres of land allows us to have the largest outdoor space of any rental community in Doral and an exceptional backdrop to our units.', 'A space which was carefully planned with outdoor minded amenities that truly make it one-of-a-kind.', 'This is a lifestyle of quietude, a serene retreat steps away from the unmistakable Shoma Bazaar food hall.', 'Boutiques abound for those who seek the kind of unique retail therapy only Sanctuary can offer.', 'Staying home has never been more enticing.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 156', 'OR Text', '156', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text with us.', 'Want more info on this unit?', 'See the link (below):', '<URL>', 'This is a 3 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1368 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Italian Cabinetry with Under- Cabinet Lighting', '- Designer Blinds', '- Bathroom with Lighted
